Jesus identifies His interest with suffering humanity. That which is done to you to make you suffer is done to Christ in the person of His saints. We believe God is working in your behalf. Only cling with un-wavering faith to the promise. May God bless you two brethren who are 


                                     -221- 

imprisoned for the truth's sake, and remember we are praying for your deliverance.--Letter 49, 1886. 









Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
January 17, 1991. Entire Letter.
